Accomodation

Delhi is a vast city with plenty of Hotels and Airbnb to stay in. As easy as it is to find one, ICON Organizing Committee has also partnered with Hotels & Hostels in the vicinity to accommodate attendees and provide convenient pricing.

Near and In-campus Stay

We have limited guest houses, hostels (in-campus) and dorm beds (near campus) available for ICON 2022. Kindly fill this form if you want to be considered for the same.
  1. Preference for accommodation will be given to faculty/industry personnel for guest house and to student authors for hostels and dorms based on availability.
  2. Accommodation will be provided on First Come First Serve basis.
Note: The deadline to apply is 30th November 2022. Allotments will be announced based on FCFS.
